about_the_game:
"SANAE's Sylphid Breeze" is a Touhou fan game with cute pixelart. With “SPELL SPOILER" she has created new ability, she inhales enemies and imitates their ability.

Enjoy the exciting time of exterminating enemies while making full use of various spells, let's make SANAE's power known in the GENSOUKYOU!

How quick! SANAE's basic actions

SANAE can run through the GENSOUKYOU nimbly through actions such as dash, jump and sliding. When faced with a high platform that is difficult to climb or a hole that leads to an abyss, she uses the miraculous wind to levitate herself up and over!

How strong! SANAE's new ability “SPELL SPOILER”!

With use SPELL SPOILER, she can inhale enemies that appear along the way and to get their ability. After get a new spell, SANAE transforms into the form of the enemies.

SANAE's adorable appearance drown by pixelart is also noteworthy.

Let's run! Racing Battle!

In the mini-game“TENGU RUMEI RACE"

SANAE and MARISA race on a course in the mountain of YOKAI.

The key to victory is how well you run on the rugged mountain path.

If you run gracefully, The TENGU take pictures of your great run!

Let's fight!　Shooting Battle!

At times, the enemies will challenge SANAE to an aerial battle!

In aerial battles, she can move freely up, down, left, and right.

And, she can not only fire "OFUDA" in rapid succession, but also use the power of KANAKO to unleash a powerful blow!

Use the above actions to your advantage,

Let's enjoy the journey of exterminating enemies together with SANAE!

name: SANAE's sylphid breeze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: "SANAE's Sylphid Breeze" is 2D Platformer game with cute pixelart. The main character in this game, SANAE KOCHIYA is a character from the "Touhou Project". With her new ability “SPELL SPOILLER, she inhales enemies and imitates their ability. Behold! SANAE's miracle adventure!!
